This skill treated as Sing or Dance.)<br><br>【Isolation】<br>Target cannot use or be the target of Assist skills through its next action. (Target can neither use nor be the target of skills like Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties, like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)
|required=Dance
|properties=random_owner
